summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through a busy urban street with multiple pedestrians and vehicles on both sides. The road is wet, indicating recent rain. The vehicle maintains a steady speed while navigating through the street.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while navigating through the wet urban street. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the pedestrians and other vehicles on both sides.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white car, approximately 5 meters away, parked. 2) Right side: Multiple motorcycles and scooters, approximately 3 meters away, parked. 3) Front: A group of pedestrians, approximately 10 meters away, walking on the sidewalk.

characters: Two men on the right side of the road
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a narrow urban road. Two men are standing on the right side of the road, near a building. The road is wet, and there are some obstacles on the right side, including a parked motorcycle and a truck.
actions: The vehicle is driving at a slow and steady speed, maintaining a safe distance from the obstacles on the right side. The driver is cautious due to the narrow road and wet conditions.
key_objects: 1) Right side: Two men standing near a building, approximately 3 meters away, stationary. 2) Right side: A parked motorcycle, approximately 5 meters away, stationary. 3) Right side: A parked truck, approximately 10 meters away, stationary.
